title: How to Make Seafood Salad in Dreamlight Valley

steps.title: Seafood Salad requires 1 Lettuce and 1 Shellfish.
steps.content: Seafood Salad requires 1 Lettuce and 1 Shellfish. You can use any kind of Shellfish, including Clams , Scallops , Oysters , or Shrimp . To cook any Entree in Dreamlight Valley, you will also need a piece of Coal as well.

steps.title: Purchase Lettuce from Goofy's Stall in Peaceful Meadow.
steps.content: Purchase Lettuce from Goofy's Stall in Peaceful Meadow. You can find Goofy's Stall in several different regions of Dreamlight Valley, but only the Peaceful Meadow location offers Lettuce. Lettuce costs 12 coins each.

steps.title: Find Shellfish along Dazzle Beach.
steps.content: Find Shellfish along Dazzle Beach. Visit Dazzle Beach and walk along the coastline to find Clams , Scallops , Oysters , or Shrimp waiting to be picked up.

steps.title: Visit a stovetop.
steps.content: Visit a stovetop. You can visit any stovetop in any kitchen in the game, even if it does not belong to you. Visit Mickey's kitchen, for example, or head to Remy's restaurant.

steps.title: Select the Seafood Salad recipe.
steps.content: Select the Seafood Salad recipe. When you interact with a stovetop, you will see all of your unlocked recipes. Select the recipe for Seafood Salad . Then, either manually select your ingredients, or allow the game to autofill them for you. Congratulations, you are making Seafood Salad!
